change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 144/2015, effective July 24, 2015.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: branch means the Finance and Administrative Services Branch of the Ministry of Education;

student loan means a debt or obligation to the government owed by a student as a result of a loan, including a direct loan, guaranteed loan and risk shared loan, made to the student under the British Columbia Student Assistance Program.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 144/2015, effective July 24, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Subject to section 3, all or part of a student loan may be forgiven by the following persons:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Minister of Advanced Education and Labour Market Development;
the Deputy Minister of Advanced Education;
the director of the branch if, in respect of the student loan, the total amount of principal and interest forgiven is not more than $40 000;
a manager of the branch if, in respect of the student loan, the total amount of principal and interest forgiven is not more than $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 144/2015, effective July 24, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 2, this regulation applies only to student loans in respect of the following programs:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the British Columbia Permanent Disability Benefits Program;
the British Columbia Debt Reduction in Repayment Program;
the British Columbia Loan Remission Program;
the British Columbia Loan Forgiveness Program;
the British Columbia Loan Reduction Program;
the Pacific Leaders British Columbia Loan Forgiveness Program;
the British Columbia Early Childhood Education Loan Assistance Program;
the British Columbia Loan Reduction Program for Residential Care Aid and Home Support Worker Programs.
